snippet.title: Planetary Pest Control - Trailer
snippet.description:
Download the game for free here! - https://dangerzone-ga.itch.io/ppc

Crash-landed on an uncharted planet, players wake up to find themselves surrounded by hordes of hostile aliens. With only each other to rely on, you must work closely to squash bugs in your way, finish your contract and get off the planet!

Planetary Pest Control is a 2-player coop adventure where you play as either Wrench, an alien monkey mechanic, or E.V, his sentient robot companion. On their own they can't make it, but working as a symbiotic team Wrench and E.V. can crush all in their way!
